lines.text: Harry, I'm going to let you in on a little secret. Every day, once a day, give yourself a present. Don't plan it. Don't wait for it. Just let it happen. It could be a new shirt at the men's store, a catnap in your office chair, or two cups of good, hot black coffee.
Harry, I have no idea where this will lead us, but I have a definite feeling it will be a place both wonderful and strange.
[repeated line]
Damn good coffee!
When did you start smoking?
I smoke every once and a while. Helps relieve tension.
When did you get so tense?
When I started smoking.

One woman can make you fly like an eagle, another can give you the strength of a lion, but only one in the Cycle Of Life can fill your heart with wonder and the wisdom that you have known a singular joy.
The owls are not what they seem.

Through the darkness of future past / The magician longs to see / One chants out between two worlds / Fire walk with me. I'll catch you with my death bag. You may think I've gone insane, but I promise I will kill again!
When you see me again, it won't be me.
[Lucy pours Cooper a cup of coffee. He takes a sip and promptly spits it out]
Damn fine coffee! And hot!
Achievement is its own reward, pride obscures it.
Where we're from, the birds sing a pretty song... and there's always music in the air.
Someday my log has something to say about this.
I feel like I know her... but sometimes my arms bend back.
Ask me why I'm whittling.
I give up. Why are you whittling?
Because that's what you do in a town where a yellow light still means slow down, not go faster.
I am 100% sure that we're not completely sure.
Jelly donuts?
Harry, that goes without saying.
Sheriff, your 24 hours are up. I demand you to arrest my client or release him!
Ben Horne, you are under arrest for the murder of Laura Palmer.
Great move, Jer.
I believe I was visited by a giant last night. Twice.
Any relations with the dwarf?
My log saw something that night.
Cooper, you remind me today of a small Mexican chi-wow-wow.
lines.character: FBI Regional Bureau Chief Gordon Cole

lines.text: I got some good news and some bad news. The bad news is that your father has bought a condo in Flip City, and the good news is that he is about to win the Civil War.
I understand we're both staying at the Great Northern. How's the food up there?
Dennis, you're in for a big surprise.
So are they.
The only thing Columbus discovered was that he was lost!
Fellas, coincidence and fate figure largely in our lives.
You're his whore, Norma.
I'd rather be his whore than your wife.
In the grand design, women were drawn from a different set of blueprints.
Harry, is that bag smiling?
How was school, son?
Fine. How was work?
Work was fine.
What exactly is it you do?
That's classified.
Didn't he want to talk to me?
Yeah, but we told him you were on your world tour, he should contact your press agent.

[with a smile to Sheriff Truman]
Harry, you're all right.
We've lain a gala reception for your fair-haired boys tonight; all of Twin Peaks' best and brightest.
We're holding it in a phone booth?
The police didn't love Laura, nobody loved Laura but us.
Well Fred, what's your line?

[undercover]
Own a gas station.
[Cooper nudges Ed in his side]
I'm an oral surgeon.
Well, I got a Chevy parked out back with a serious root-canal problem. Want to take a look?
It's not the first time, it won't be the last, but I'm in that doghouse again.
[repeated line]

[into a microphone]
Is this thing on?
/ In thee is my trust, leave not me / Keep me from the snares they have laid for me / And the gins of the workers of iniquity / Let the wicked fall into their own nets / Whilst that I withal escape.
